entity.label: Account name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Account name should be between 1 and 50
Account name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.

entity.label: Webex API Base Endpoint
entity.help: Enter the Webex API Base Endpoint

oauth.label: Redirect url
oauth.help: Please add this redirect URL in your app.

help.text: Select the authorization scopes. Please ensure that the scopes entered here match those selected in your Webex Integration.

entity.label: Gov Account
entity.help: Check this option if you are using a Gov Account.

options.text: Click here to learn more about the FedRAMP API limitations.

validators.errorMsg: Max host length is 4096
Max length of username is 50
Max length of password is 8192

options.saveValidator: function(formData) { if(!formData.proxy_enabled || formData.proxy_enabled === '0') {return true; } if(!formData.proxy_url) { return 'Proxy Host can not be empty'; } if(!formData.proxy_port) { return 'Proxy Port can not be empty'; } return true; }

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: API Endpoint
entity.help: The endpoint of the Webex API. Example: devices, devices/12345678, messages

validators.errorMsg: Do not include a leading slash (/) before the endpoint.

entity.label: Webex Base API URL
entity.help: Enter the base URL for the endpoint (usually webexapis.com). If the endpoint requires the analytics:read_all scope, you may need to use analytics.webexapis.com. Please check the endpoint documentation to confirm which to use.

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: If required by the endpoint, add a start date and time in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (inclusive). It is recommended to set the start time to the current time.

validators.errorMsg: Start time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: End Time
entity.help: End date and time in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.(Optional). End Time must be after the Start Time.

validators.errorMsg: End time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2033-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: Query Params
entity.help: Add as comma-separated values additional query params to be included in the call of the API, each param will be concatenated to the URL you previously entered. Example: locationId=0000000, messageId=0000000, teamId=0000000.

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: Start date and time (inclusive) in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. It's recommended to set Start Time to the current time.

validators.errorMsg: Start time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: End Time
entity.help: End date and time in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.(Optional). End Time must be after the Start Time.

validators.errorMsg: End time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2033-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Site Name
entity.help: Site Name of the Webex Meeting account.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: Start date and time (inclusive) in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. The start time must be set to 24 hours prior to the current UTC time. The interval between Start Time and End Time cannot exceed 30 days and Start Time cannot be earlier than 90 days ago.

validators.errorMsg: Start time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: End Time
entity.help: End date and time in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.(Optional). Leave it blank if an ongoing ingestion mode is needed. The interval between Start Time and End Time cannot exceed 30 days.

validators.errorMsg: End time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2033-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: List events which occurred after a specific date and time. Start date and time MUST be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSSZ.

validators.errorMsg: Start time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z)

entity.label: End Time
entity.help: List events which occurred before a specific date and time. End date and time MUST be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSSZ.(Optional). End Time must be after the Start Time.

validators.errorMsg: End time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSSZ (example:2033-01-01T00:00:00.000Z)

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: Start Time can NOT be earlier than 7 days ago. Start time MUST be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

validators.errorMsg: Start time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: End Time
entity.help: End time MUST be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.(Optional). End Time must be after the Start Time.

validators.errorMsg: End time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2033-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds

validators.errorMsg: Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Start Time
entity.help: The specified time must be between 5 minutes ago and 48 hours ago, and be formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmZ

validators.errorMsg: Start time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z)

entity.label: End Time
entity.help: The specified time should be later than start time but no later than 48 hours, and be formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmZ

validators.errorMsg: End time must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ (example:2033-01-01T00:00:00Z)

entity.label: Locations
entity.help: Name of the location (as shown in Control Hub). Up to 10 comma-separated locations can be provided.

validators.errorMsg: Locations value should be comma-separated. Example: A, B, C
